# TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations.restricted(_:)

**Case**

Restricts the proposed destination to the given identifiers

## Declaration

```swift
case restricted([EquipmentIdentifier])
```

## Destinations

- **TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations.any**: Any equipment is allowed to be the proposed destination

items.description: Any equipment is allowed to be the proposed destination
